metadata.title: CVE-2022-2588 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
It was discovered that the cls_route filter implementation in the Linuxkernel would not remove an old filter from the hashtable before freeing itif its handle had the value 0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2588` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-231-generic - 4.4.0-231.265
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-231-generic - 4.4.0-231.265
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-231-lowlatency - 4.4.0-231.265
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-191-generic - 4.15.0-191.202~16.04.1
